alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:20PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Lauderdale County through 500 PM CDT... At 419 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a few strong thunderstorm over Marion, or near Meridian, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Marion around 430 PM CDT. Meridian around 445 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
